markdown:
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- One bulb of this tiny hourglass contains black sand, the other white. After even a few grains pass from one side to the other, it reverses its flow to keep the two sides in equilibrium. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 17.
  • **Armor** You gain resistance 2 to [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118).
  • **Weapon** After you cast a [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spell by Activating the _sandglass_, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 negative damage until the end of your next turn.
Grim Sandglass **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 55 gp Grim Sandglass (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 450 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 5, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d6, and the spell DC is 24. Grim Sandglass (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 2,000 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 10, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d8, and the spell DC is 29.
